LanguageData.SSC.StateAbnormal: Cannot reach sea water. Sand pumping stopped.
LanguageData.PlaceWorker.TerrainCannotSupport: The terrain cannot support this object.
LanguageData.PlaceWorker.MustWaterSeaOrPile: Must be placed in shallow water or on the pilings.
LanguageData.PlaceWorker.InteractivePointMustshore: Interaction point must be placed on the shore.
LanguageData.PlaceWorker.AlreadyPile: The terrain here is already pilings.
LanguageData.TidalGenerator.NoContactSea: Status: The water turbine of the tide generator cannot reach sea water. Generator stopped.
LanguageData.TidalGenerator.WaterTurbineMustSea: The water turbine of the tide generator must be placed in sea water.
LanguageData.TidalGenerator.MainBuildingMustShore: The main structure of the tide generator must be placed on the shore.
LanguageData.TideUtility.WarningInfo: Please pay attention to the position of the colonists!
LanguageData.FertilizerProductionMachine.blocking: Status: The interaction point is blocked. Production stopped. Please clear the space up before continuing.
